org.cogsprok.gribeauval

Class ModuleRegistry

  • Object
    • ModuleRegistry

  • public final class ModuleRegistry
extends Object
    Central Registry of Module Attributes and Information

    Intended to be used as a central source to retrieve any necessary information about Modules found in the Modules Directory. Consists mainly of HashMaps storing various information, generally keyed with each Module's jar filename.

    The ModuleScanner.scan method invokes the register method and passes it HashMaps of JarFile objects and URLs of Modules found. From this the register method compiles various information.

    Specific information such as the classes in a particular module, the headers and values of a module's manifest, and the Display-Names of the modules can be retrieved. The URL location object can also be retrieved for all or a specific Module, which is useful for creating a ModuleLoader instance for a Module.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    John Wilson
